short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate WhatsApp links using phone numbers and country codes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Simplify your communication process by generating WhatsApp links instantly! This extension allows you to create direct links to WhatsApp chats using phone numbers and predefined country codes. Save time and effort by creating shareable links in just a few clicksâ€”no need to manually format URLs.

Key Features:

Country Code Selection: Choose from a list of predefined country codes, or set your default for quick access.
Instant Link Generation: Simply enter the phone number, and the link is created in seconds.
Copy to Clipboard: Easily copy the generated link to your clipboard for quick sharing.
Persistent Settings: Your country code preferences are saved for future use, making link generation even faster.
Who is this for? Ideal for business owners, customer support teams, or anyone who frequently uses WhatsApp for communication. Generate links on-the-fly to connect with clients, colleagues, or friends without any hassle.

How to use:

Click on the extension icon.
Select the country code and enter the phone number.
Click "Generate Link" and copy it to your clipboard.
Share the link anywhere!
Start simplifying your WhatsApp communication with just a few clicks!
